messages.subject: Meeting other unschoolers - attn carolyn in TX
messages.msgSnippet: would you mind informing me when you get together with homeschooling families in N texas - we don t know any.  My boy Echo is 3.5!  thanks geneva
messages.messageBody:
would you mind informing me when you get together with homeschooling families in N texas - we don't know any. My boy Echo is 3.5! thanks

geneva
goza@...


----- Original Message -----
From: Carolyn Vu
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, July 12, 2004 7:12 PM
Subject: Re: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Meeting other unschoolers


--- Geneva Goza <goza@...> wrote:
> Well is anyone in Dallas??


Hi Geneva,

I'm in Grand Prairie. I know one other unschooling
mom with a 3 yr old, and a few other homeschooling
families through a local homeschool support group
(Tarrant Home Education Association - THEA). My
children are too young for most of the scheduled THEA
activities, but we usually meet with the homeschooling
families on our own for weekly science museum trips &
playgroup.

-Carolyn
mom to Kristen(28 months) & Paul (7 months)
